author: fielding
msg: The rule for XML is that content should never be placed within the
markup attributes.  Allow our documents to be better XML by moving
the section title into its own child element.  Likewise, allow section
elements to be nested to form subsections.

author: fielding
msg: Make it easy for all of the elements containing href or src attributes

author: fielding
msg: I guess we need to extend org.jdom.Element to add a setTextCDATA method.
The problem is that jdom relies on polymorphism in addContent and there is
no way for us to do a new CDATA (" ") inside the call to addContent
The other problem is that jdom expects the output to be XML, but we need
an output that will work on old browsers.
